actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide cost-of-living allowances for officers and employees of the judicial branch of Government stationed outside the continental United States or in Alaska.

summary.text: Provides that appropriations and funds available to the judicial branch of the Government, for the pay of officers and employees of that branch (including judges of the United States) stationed outside the continental United States or in Alaska are available to provide a cost-of-living allowance to such officers and employees. States that such allowance shall be based on living costs substantially higher than in the District of Columbia but shall not exceed 25 percent of the rate of salary or compensation of such employee.

titles.title: A bill to provide cost-of-living allowances for officers and employees of the judicial branch of Government stationed outside the continental United States or in Alaska.
